page.title: 19RECREATION IN ROGERSTONE
page.content: Leisure facilities in the area include the football pitches at Cefn Wood Community Centre.Risca Leisure Centre, although just outside the block has been very important to the people of the area.However the new Newport Leisure Centre with its exciting pool and wave machine will probably soon be used by more people. Leisure pursuits vary.A lot of people go swimming,play squash, badminton and soccer.Some attend dancing classes,gymnastics,yoga and keep fit classes at the Community Centre. Hobbies and interests inside the home vary from stamp collecting to Subbuteo table football league. Computing,computer games and watching television are also popular.
